alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 22 at 9:31PM EST until February 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: .An ice jam may cause water to infiltrate the lowlands along the river. ...FLOOD WATCH FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Michigan, including the following county, Ottawa. * WHEN...Through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Localized flooding of low lying areas and property along the Grand River will be possible. Rapid water level fluctuations may occur due to heavy ice cover on the river and possible ice jam formation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A significant ice jam will continue to slowly move downriver over the next few days, maintaining the potential for flooding, including at some areas along the river that typically don`t have flooding problems. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
